record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - September 06, 2007)

[Page: H10196]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on Thursday, September 6, 2007, I was unavoidably detained due to a prior obligation.
I request that the CONGRESSIONAL RECORD reflect that had I been present and voting, I would have voted as follows:
Rollcall No. 854: "Yea". On approving the journal.
Rollcall No. 855: "Yea". On agreeing to the resolution.
Rollcall No. 856: "No". On agreeing to the amendment.
Rollcall No. 857: "No". On agreeing to the amendment.
Rollcall No. 858: "No". On agreeing to the amendment.
Rollcall No. 859: "Aye". On passage of H.R. 2786.
